span: [READING] Alright, think aloud as you try to infer the hidden rule. You'll be able to write your guess once the timer finishes.

span: So nothing really sticks out to me too much based on what I just, what I just saw.

I think one of the rules maybe is, there's always a blue triangle over a green triangle, which seems to occur in option A, option E, and option F.
So that's the one thing that sticks out to me as um what the hidden rule might be.
